LanguageData.BloodRain.label: blood rain
LanguageData.BloodRain.description: A turgid blood-like psychofluid that falls from the sky. Anyone exposed to it feels a growing anger that eventually becomes a berserk rage.
LanguageData.Chimera.label: chimera
LanguageData.CorruptedObelisk.label: corrupted obelisk
LanguageData.Deathpall.label: deathpall
LanguageData.Deathpall.description: A corpse-gray cloud composed of microscopic self-powered archites created by some unknown superintelligence. When they land on dead flesh, they enter the body and reanimate it to create a shambling imitation of life.
LanguageData.Devourer.label: devourer
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.label: dreadmeld
LanguageData.Fleshbeasts.label: fleshbeast
LanguageData.Fleshbeasts.description: Hideous creatures composed of masses of cancerous flesh. Some contain multiple nervous systems, allowing them to split into smaller fleshbeasts.
LanguageData.FleshmassHeart.label: fleshmass heart
LanguageData.FleshmassNucleus.label: fleshmass nucleus
LanguageData.Ghoul.label: ghoul
LanguageData.Ghoul.description: A person implanted with an archotech shard and twisted by dark psychic influences into a jittering murder machine.
LanguageData.GoldenCube.label: golden cube
LanguageData.Gorehulk.label: gorehulk
LanguageData.HarbingerTree.label: harbinger tree
LanguageData.Metalhorror.label: metalhorror
LanguageData.Nociosphere.label: nociosphere
LanguageData.Noctol.label: noctol
LanguageData.Noctolith.label: noctolith
LanguageData.PitGate.label: pit gate
LanguageData.Revenant.label: revenant
LanguageData.Shambler.label: shambler
LanguageData.Shambler.description: Corpses reanimated by microscopic archites. Shamblers are slow, mindless, and will attack relentlessly. Unless captured, shamblers die from metabolic exhaustion after several days.
LanguageData.Sightstealer.label: sightstealer
LanguageData.TwistedObelisk.label: twisted obelisk
LanguageData.UnnaturalCorpse.label: unnatural corpse
LanguageData.UnnaturalCorpse.description: An odd corpse that feels waxy and warm to the touch. Something is deeply unsettling about it.
LanguageData.VoidMonolith.label: void monolith
LanguageData.VoidNode.label: void node
LanguageData.VoidStructure.label: void structure
LanguageData.WarpedObelisk.label: warped obelisk
